Shadow_Punch.help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a quick punch that deals minor damage. Shadow Punches cloud the target's vision, lowering his chance to hit for a short time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Shadow_Punch.targetHelp: The Shadow Punch has reduced your Accuracy.

Smite.help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a Smite that deals more damage than Shadow Punch, but has a longer recharge time. Smite clouds the target's vision, lowering his chance to hit for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Smite.targetHelp: The Smite has reduced your Accuracy.

Shadow_Maul.help: You wrap your entire arms with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a series of blows that deal a lot of damage over a short period of time to multiple targets in front of you. These blows cloud your target's vision, lowering his chance to hit for a short time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Shadow_Maul.targetHelp: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Shadow Maul.

Touch_of_Fear.help: The Netherworld is one scary place, and with but a touch, you can give your enemy a glimpse into this dark world. This will cause them to helplessly tremble in Fear. Foes in this state of panic have reduced chance to hit. Recharge: Moderate
Touch_of_Fear.targetHelp: You are terrified and your chance to hit is reduced.

Siphon_Life.help: You tap the power of the Netherworld and create a life transferring conduit between a foe and yourself. This will transfer Hit Points from your enemy to yourself. Foes Siphoned in this manner have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Siphon_Life.shortHelp: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe -To Hit, Self +HP
Siphon_Life.targetHelp: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Siphon Life attack.

Taunt.help: Challenges a foe to attack you. Useful to pull a villain off an ally who finds themselves in over their head. A To Hit check required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Fast
Taunt.targetHelp: You have been challenged and taunted.

messages.attackerHit: You Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
Your {PowerName} hit, and you Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
messages.victimHit: {Playersource} hit you with their {Powername}. You have been Taunted!

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} partially hit! {PlayerDest} is not taunted but their range is reduced!
messages.victimHit: {Playersource} partially hits you with their Taunt! Your range is reduced but the Taunt is not successful!

Dark_Consumption.help: The dark power of the Netherworld allows you to tap the essence of your foe's soul and transfer it to yourself. This will drain the Hit Points of your enemy and add to your Endurance. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

Soul_Drain.help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

Midnight_Grasp.help: Mastery over the forces of the Netherworld allows you to create dark tentacles that can Immobilize a foe and continuously drain his life force. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Midnight_Grasp.shortHelp: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit
Midnight_Grasp.targetHelp: The dark tentacles of the Midnight Grasp are holding you immobile. Your chance to hit is reduced.
